page.title: 10Events.
page.content: The village of Fernhurst holds a traditional annual event,usually in early June,called The Village Revels. A May Queen is elected each year and she presides over the celebrations held in June.These include traditional items including maypole dancing,processions through the village,crowning ceremonies and a small pageant involving St. George and the Dragon.Local organisations combine to organise a fete on the special day and villagers enjoy a supper and dance during the evening.Many previous May Queens attend the function and provide links with earlier celebrations.
